item.title: Using clusterGroups in the Validated Patterns Framework
item.description: What Is a clusterGroup? The Validated Patterns framework defines itself in terms of clusterGroups. A clusterGroup is a set of one or more Kubernetes clusters that are managed to have the same deployments (that is, subscriptions and applications, namespaces and projects) applied to each member of the same clustergroup.
